title: By-pass and complications
text:
Hello, this is my second post about my bypass. At first I was worried because I wasnt feeling full when I ate, and my dietitian made it worse by saying I was eating twice as much as her other patients, even though I was following my clinics guidelines. Now theres a suspicion of a stricture because I often vomit and feel like food gets stuck. My surgeon wants to wait 23 more weeks before considering an endoscopy, and tomorrow will be one month since my surgery.

I feel overwhelmed and emotionally exhausted. I just want to live a normal life like other people my age, but ever since the sleeve and now the bypass, I feel stuck in a bubble while everyone else moves forward. It weighs heavily on me. Ive also only lost one kilo in the last two weeks, and Im really not doing well. Has anyone else had repeated vomiting and that stuck feeling around 4 weeks post-op? Chewing well and eating very slowly helps, but my surgeon still hasnt ruled out a stricture.
relevance_reason: Strong bariatric context with post-surgery complications but no PBH-specific indicators
